examples.example: 我每天都坚持学习英文，这让我的语言能力有了很大提升。

translate.english: I insist on learning English every day, which has greatly improved my language ability.

examples.example: 我非常喜欢英文歌曲，它们的旋律和歌词都很动人。

translate.english: I like English songs very much, and their melodies and lyrics are very touching.

examples.example: 我很享受阅读英文书籍，从中领略到了不一样的精彩世界。

translate.english: I really enjoy reading English books and have appreciated a different wonderful world from them.
